name: Lontara Warrior
description:
"Lontara Warrior" is a casual mobile game where players play as Sultan Hasanuddin fights Dutch invaders. The game is played by answering several Lontara questions correctly so as to reduce the enemy's life until the life runs out and the enemy loses. This game teaches to learn, read and write Aksara Lontara.

This game is a mobile game, so you can play on your smartphone device. Play Store link coming soon.
